title: Free Guide To Profitable Tomato Farming in Kenya From Seeds to Harvesting 2025

**Understand the Market**: Research market conditions, timing for high prices.
**Select Variety**: Choose high-yielding varieties like Terminator F1 or F1 from Seminis.
**Prepare Soil**: Use well-drained, fertile soil; apply manure and compost.
**Planting Techniques**: Proper spacing (60 cm x 60 cm), timely planting, applying manure.
**Fertilization**: Follow precise schedule (DAP, NPK, calcium).
**Pest Control**: Manage Tuta absoluta and whiteflies with specific chemicals.
**Disease Management**: Treat early blight and yellow leaf spot.
**Cost Analysis**: Calculate costs and expected profit (300 crates at ~1k each).
**Yield Optimization**: Use potassium and calcium fertilizers, maintain greenhouse conditions.
